name: Sunny Voyage
description:
Sunny Voyage is an epic turn-based anime RPG based off the popular anime. Play through the authentic storyline and dominate this mysterious land!
Recruit your favorite characters from the anime and build your dream crew team. Explore the world of and relive your favorite moments from the anime.
Battle with other players from all over the world in this anime adventure game!

Are you ready to start on an adventure into the anime world?

GAME FEATURES:

AMAZING ANIME WORLD
• Explore the epic anime story from the beginning through every amazing storyline
• Join the main character and get stronger and dominate the world along with him!
• The unpredictable and diverse world is now yours to explore!

RECRUIT ANIME CHARACTERS WITH DIVERSE TYPE
• Recruit crews from your your favorite anime
• Unlock new characters by joining events, clearing story missions, etc.
• Tank, warrior, Assassin and support crews, all kinds of crews, take your pick


MORE CREWS, MORE SKILLS, MORE BATTLES, MORE GAMEPLAYS!
• Multiple maps, thousands of stages, from normal to hard difficulties, waiting for you to challenge
• Turn based strategy battles with different character matchups and skills
• Plenty of diverse gameplay, such as PVP Arena, Ladder, Treasure Hunt, Impel Down, Misty Ocean so on.

REAL-TIME PVP BATTLES
• Play against players from all over the world in real-time.
• Train and strengthen your crews, improve the team's combat power, and dominate the battlefield
• Fight with friends or rivals, join union battles, and clan battles, in your quest for supreme glory

You'll get many free rewards to help you start your epic journey, after downloading the game. What are you waiting for?! Hurry up, join this brand new world and fight for your life and glory!
Download now, enjoy the awesome game with your friends, and relive the youthful days of your favorite crew!
